meanings.definition: A book containing rules of etiquette or information on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: In her bluebook, she found the proper way to set a table.
meanings.sent2: I always refer to the bluebook for guidance on formal events.
meanings.sent3: The bluebook taught him the importance of saying please and thank you.
meanings.sent4: Her bluebook was a treasure trove of social norms and customs.
meanings.sent5: The bluebook was like a wise friend, full of advice on how to behave.

meanings.definition: A booklet used for writing down answers or information during an exam.
meanings.sent1: During the test, she quickly jotted down notes in her bluebook.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to bring your bluebook to the exam to write your responses.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally left his bluebook at home and panicked during the test.
meanings.sent4: The bluebook was his lifeline during the exam, holding all the answers.
meanings.sent5: Her bluebook was filled with scribbles and solutions, a testament to her hard work.
